name: Cartaur Wizard
description:
A chosen hero wizard from the past loses his legs when an evil wizard from the future brings him to the battlefield. He now must join a weaponized car to fight the evil wizard's forces. How long can he survive?

This is a game by Pepe Relo, made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam of 2021. It requires a mouse to play. Please enjoy!
